title: Cardreader Diagnostics
description: Diagnostics message sent from any Vix-validator running Ruter-firmware in the vehicle. Can be used by both PTA and PTO to monitor the operational status of these units.

eventTimestamp.description: Event timestamp must be ISO 8601 UTC

deviceRef.description: An unique ID of the unit. This value is appended to the published topic.

inService.description: True if cardreader is in service.
